quote.sentence_before: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.
quote.sentence_after: It was a hobbit-hole, and that means comfort.

quote: Before you go, Bilbo says that he doesn't want any adventures.
Then Gandalf says he has no time to blow smoke-rings because he's looking for someone to share an adventure.
Gandalf later tells Bilbo about his past as a wizard involved in many adventures.
